snippet: MATES--Jack Kenneth. Died April 19th, 2014. Formerly President and CEO of Velcro USA. Formerly President, Chairman, Chairman Emeritus of Distinguished Flying Cross Society (DFCS). Donations in lieu of flowers, to DFCS Scholarship Fund, PO Box 5024...

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  MATES, JACK KENNETH

lead_paragraph: MATES--Jack Kenneth. Died April 19th, 2014. Formerly President and CEO of Velcro USA. Formerly President, Chairman, Chairman Emeritus of Distinguished Flying Cross Society (DFCS). Donations in lieu of flowers, to DFCS Scholarship Fund, PO Box 502408, San Diego, CA 92150.
